text: The Yamaha T-150 is an underbone manufactured by Yamaha Motor Company since 2015. It is known as the Exciter 150 in Thailand and Vietnam, Sniper 150 MXi in the Philippines and Singapore, Jupiter MX/MX King 150 in Indonesia, and Y15ZR in Malaysia. It is powered by a single-cylinder engine. == 2018 update == In August 2018, the T-150 received some updates. The bike now features a LED headlamp, wider front tire and different handlebar cowl that also houses a LCD instrument panel, from the previous version combination analogue/digital gauge, which is complemented by a passing light switch, engine kill switch and alarm fob. The bike is also claimed to be heavier than the previous version. The engine specifications remain the same.https://paultan.org/2018/08/03/2019-yamaha-exciter-150-gp-released-in- vietnam/ Yamaha Jupiter MX 150 (Indonesia) == References == == External links == * (Indonesia) T-150 T-150 Category:Motorcycles introduced in 2015
title: Yamaha T-150
